name: Dolphin Day Out
description:
This game was created for the Godot Wild Jam #41 Theme Ocean

Play as a dolphin that just wanna have fun in the ocean. 

Bump into fish!

Avoid the sharks and jellyfish!

Do aerial somersaults! 

Help MewMew the cat catch fish in her boat.

Controls WASD or arrow keys. W/UP - Forward thrust, A/D/LEFT/RIGHT - Rotate, S/DOWN - Backwards Thrust, SHIFT - Shoot bubble

Hint - Bubbles will disable sharks temporarily.

Hint #2 - There are actually two game modes.

Hint #3 - ?

TOOLS

Graphics - Piskel

Sound - BXFR

Programming - GodotEngine 3.4.2

CREDITS

Intro and Exploration Music - Ocean Dusk by Jordan O & Co https://jottesen.itch.io/loopable-video-game-music

Time Trial Music - Ludum Dare 30 Track 4 by Abstraction https://soundcloud.com/abstraction/sets/ludum-dare-challenge

Featuring musical SFX from https://backgroundsounds.itch.io/100-game-sound-effects

Water splash SFX from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/water-splash...

Bubble pop SFX from https://www.fiftysounds.com/royalty-free-music/sfx-pop.html (fiftysounds)

Font - https://www.fontspace.com/cute-aurora-font-f46818 (611 Studio)

Font - https://www.fontspace.com/excluded-font-f43356 (Foyezes)

Code adapted from - https://github.com/johnnygossdev/tutorials/tree/master/floating-text (JohnnyGossdev)
